mappings.name: Fetches the backup management usage summaries of the vault.

value.description: The list of backup management usages for the given vault.

mappings.name: Provides a pageable list of all intents that are present within a vault.
Used to remove intent from an item - 204
Create Intent for Enabling backup of an item. This is a synchronous operation.
Provides the details of the protection intent up item. This is an asynchronous o...
It will validate if given feature with resource properties is supported in service

containerName.description: Specifies the product specific container name. E.g. iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainer;csname;vmname.

errorCode.description: ErrorCode in case of intent failed

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage in case of intent failed.

fabricName.description: Specifies the fabric name - Azure or AD

policyName.description: Specifies the policy name which is used for protection

protectedItemName.description: Specifies the product specific ds name. E.g. vm;iaasvmcontainer;csname;vmname.

protectionStatus.description: Specifies whether the container is registered or not

vaultId.description: Specifies the arm resource id of the vault

mappings.name:
It will validate followings
1. Vault capacity
2. VM is already protected
3. Any VM related configuration passed in properties.

containerName.description:
Specifies the product specific container name. E.g. iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainer;rgname;vmname. This is required
for portal

protectedItemName.description: Specifies the product specific ds name. E.g. vm;iaasvmcontainer;rgname;vmname. This is required for portal

schema.description: Response contract for enable backup validation request
